translation: by listening, truth and contentment arise
by listening, one gains the fruit of all sixty-eight tirths
are crowned with genuine respect and honor
by listening, the mind becomes gently attached
to a state of spontaneous, balanced meditation
O Nanak, the bhagats, the devoted ones
are ever in expansion, joy, and inner blossoming
through listening, pain and the burden of sin
are destroyed and made to vanish. ||10||
